Text:
Just before the preliminaries for the Bushin
Festival...
Let me just speak directly.
Cid....please go on a date with me!
...Nope.
...What? ...What??!
(Am I hearing things? I think Cid turned me down.)
Cid stares blankly as he munches on his sandwich.

(...I must be hearing things. The cafeteria is so
loud and busy that I didn't hear him right.
That must be it.)
Let me say it once more. Cid, please go on a da—
Nope means nope.
B-But why?!

Let's turn this around. I don't get why you are
asking me to go out on a date...
W-Well...
(Because I want to create memories with you!!)

Rose swallows the words she was about to say and
tries hard to maintain a calm face.

In the future, I may need to act as a security escort
for high-profile officials.
Oh, right. Royal families have to do stuff like that.

So in order to practice for that...I want to go on
dates with you...!
Cid suddenly frowns,  his mouth twisting.
Hmm... Nah, you've lost me again.
Pl-Please listen to me until the end.

(This is the moment of truth, Rose. I will make Cid
nod in agreement!)

...I am to meet a subject of the Kingdom of Oriana.
I don't have to pretend as if I am wise in the ways
of the world, but I don't want him take to all the
initiative.

There is a curriculum on this kind of etiquette at
school, but I haven't been able to take that class
ever since the incident!

As both a princess of a kingdom and as a lady, to
continue like this is just too anxiety-inducing!

(Oh, I am just being selfish and dancing around the
truth. I just want to go on a date with you Cid.
Everything else is a lie.)

(Urk... I am not sure why, but I think he can see
through everything I am saying.)
(What should I do...!)

(If I let this chance slip through my grasp, I am
sure I will never get a date with Cid...!)

(Actually, if I let my true feelings slip out
now, I would probably lose control and
end up declaring my endless devotion
to our fateful love!)

(Can't I allow myself to have even just one day for a
date with my beloved Cid?!)
Sounds like a hassle. Well, I need to get goin⁠—
W-Wait a minute!

(Rose! What are you doing! You need to get the right
words out if you want to stop him!)

(But...what should I do? I can't say so many lies
when I am looking into Cid's eyes⁠—they are as
beautiful as a twinkling starry sky.)
(But if this continues, I will... I will...)

Cid looks startled. Probably because Rose's eyes
are filling up with tears.
Huh... Wow! The student president is crying...?
Because of that guy? Who is he?
What...?!
O-Okay. I get it. I got it, so chin up.
So...you will go on a date with me?!

Err...yes? So please stop the waterworks, okay?
You're bringing way too much attention to us!
Oh! Thank you! Thank you so much, Cid!
I...I am...so happy...
What? Are you still crying?!

Look, that guy is making the student president cry.
Sheesh.
Yeah, what an asshole!  No respect at all.
Aw damn... now everyone is staring at us.
After school...
...I apologize for getting so upset before.
Um, it's fine. It's okay.

I really appreciate your kindness. I feel better now,
so let's have a fun date!
Yeah, sure...

Shortly afterwards the two are strolling around the
capital when they find themselves in front of a pet
shop.
Interested?
...Uh, yes. A little...
Then why don't you go in?
But...
You want to have a look, don't you?

Saying that, Cid steps into the pet shop.
Rose hesitates slightly but follows.
This is...what they call a pet shop, isn't it?
First time?
Yes...
Can I touch these puppies?
If we ask the shop staff, maybe.
Excuse me. Can we pick up this puppy?
Um... C-Cid!
Certainly, let me just get him out of his cage.
Woof, woof!
There you go. Please hold him gently.
There you go.
(B-But...I'm not mentally ready.... Oh...!)
*sniff*
How adorable. And so warm, too...
Never had a pet?
No. And I never will.
But you like animals, don't you?
How did you know that?
It's written all over your face...
Hehe. Oh, really?
I love little puppies so much, but I am a princess...

My duty is to my kingdom and my people, I can't take
responsibility for another life on a mere whim.
Strong sense of responsibility, gotcha.

I think that is normal for someone born into a royal
family. It doesn't mean that I have a particularly
strong sense of responsibility.
Hmm... Is that true though...?
It would be nice to have more freedom.
(It would be like a dream to have more freedom...)
After that...

Thank you very much for accompanying me today.
I appreciate you joining me despite my selfishness.
So I will see you soon...

(I hope⁠—no, I pray that next time we meet I can be
more of myself...)

You looked like you were gonna bawl your eyes out
again. Maybe you got dust in them this time?

Cid's eyes reflect on the sight of Rose's back as she
hurries off.
